testcase.name: Verify the customer view endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given User prepares a GET request using the following parameters: "http://localhost:4547/Blog.Api/".passed When GET request is triggered for the following EndPoint: "{customerID}/CustomerView" and path parameter "1111".passed Then Status code "200" should be verified...................................passed And Verify that customer details should be "1111", "testerA@abc.com", "testerBFirst", "testerBLast".passed

testcase.name: Verify the customer view endpoint does not return as details for an invalid ID
testcase.system-out: Given User prepares a GET request using the following parameters: "http://localhost:4547/Blog.Api/".passed When GET request is triggered for the following EndPoint: "{customerID}/CustomerView" and path parameter "22".passed Then Status code "404" should be verified...................................passed

testcase.name: Verify the customers endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given User prepares a GET request using the following parameters: "http://localhost:4547/Blog.Api/".passed When GET request is triggered for the following EndPoint: "Customers".......passed Then Status code "404" should be verified...................................passed And Verify that the number of customer records in the response is "6".......passed

testcase.name: Verify the customer IDs in the customers endpoint
testcase.system-out: Given User prepares a GET request using the following parameters: "http://localhost:4547/Blog.Api/".passed When GET request is triggered for the following EndPoint: "Customers".......passed Then Status code "404" should be verified...................................passed And Verify that the displayed customer IDs are" 1111,2222,3333,4444,5555,6666".passed
